titleStmt.title: The unfortunate heroes, or, The adventures of ten famous men, viz, Ovid, Lentullus, Hortensius, Herennius, Cepion, Horace, Virgil, Cornelius Gallus, Crassus, Agrippa, banished from the court of Augustus Cæsar in ten novels / composed by that great wit of France, Monsieur de Villa dieu ; Englished by a gentleman for his diversion.
Exilez de la cour d'Auguste. English
titleStmt.author: Villedieu, Madame de, d. 1683.
Gentleman.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Exilez de la cour d'Auguste.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
